titles.title: To amend titles XI and XIX of the Social Security Act to provide for American Samoa treatment under the Medicaid Program similar to that provided to States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 3/11/2003--Introduced. Amends titles XI and XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to provide American Samoa with treatment under Medicaid similar to that provided to States.
